channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: After Yang
channel.desc: Sci-Fi 2021 A small family thinks twice before repairing their robotic son Yang, till they decide to rescue him from decomposing for the sake of their adopted daughter, facing many obstacles and mixed feelings. Colin Farrell, Jodie Turner-Smith, Malea Emma Tjandrawidjaja, Justin H. Min, Orlagh Cassidy, Kogonada, Kogonada.
